mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (uname, id, email, password, createdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{uname}, #{id}, #{email}, #{password}, to_char(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT count(seq) FROM tb_user WHERE email = #{email} and password = #{password}
SELECT a.seq, a.title, a.sub_title, c.code_name as c_code, a.createdate FROM tb_article a INNER JOIN tb_code c ON a.c_code = c.code ORDER BY a.count desc, a.createdate desc LIMIT 3;
